uniques.name: 100,000 Steps
secondary_stats: Evade Grants 10% Attack Speed for 3 Seconds
terciary_stats: Movement Speed per Walking Arsenal Bonus
uniques.effect: When activating or refreshing the full Walking Arsenal Key Passive effect, you automatically cast Ground Stomp and gain [50-100] Fury. Can only occur once every 10 seconds.
uniques.flavor: "While many Barbarians remained in the Dreadlands, small groups from the Oxen, Crane and Bear tribes instead chose to search the land for a new home." - A History of the Children of Bul-Kathos

uniques.name: Ahavarion, Spear of Lycander
secondary_stats: 159.5% Critical Strike, Vulnerable, and Overpower Damage
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a 5% Chance to Restore 66% Primary Resource
uniques.effect: Gain a random Shrine effect for 20 seconds after killing an Elite enemy. Can only occur once every 30 seconds.
uniques.flavor: "The angel Lycander left us a portion of her power in this spear. It is all the proof I need that she watches over us still." - Oracle Argoysni

uniques.name: Airidah's Inexorable Will
uniques.effect: When casting an Ultimate Skill and again 5 seconds after, you Pull in Distant enemies and deal [X] Physical damage to them. This damage is increased by x1% per 1 point of Willpower you have.
uniques.flavor: "When I was born, I breathed in the wind and the storm and they gave me life. When I die, I will breath out, and return that gift to the skies." - Journal excerpt

uniques.name: Ancients' Oath
uniques.effect: Steel Grasp launches 2 additional chains. Enemies hit by Steel Grasp take x [40-60%] increased damage from you for 5 seconds.
uniques.flavor: "Weapons wielded by the fiercest warriors often catch the eye of the Ancient spirits. If the wielder is worthy, the spirits may bless the steel with their strength." - Gerti, Oxen Tribe Forgemaster

uniques.name: Andariel's Visage
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: Up to a 20% chance to trigger a poison nova that applies [X] Poisoning damage over 5 seconds to enemies in the area.
uniques.flavor: The horrific whispers of the Maiden of Anguish flicker through your mind, pushing you ever closer to madness...

uniques.name: Arreat's Bearing
terciary_stats: Call of the Ancients Cooldown Reduction
uniques.effect:
Ancients you summon are empowered.
Korlic creates an Earthquake that deals [X] Physical damage over 4 seconds when he leaps.
Talic leaves behind Dust Devils that deal [X] damage while he whirlwinds.
Mawdac ignites the ground Burning enemies for an additional [X] damage over 4 seconds when he upheaves the ground.
uniques.flavor: "Rise clansmen and reclaim our trampled honor! Ancients' blood runs through us all! We are storms - earth breaking, maelstrom wielding. The fire of the gods burn still! They are with us!" - Ealda

uniques.name: Asheara's Khanjar
uniques.effect: Hits with this weapon increase your Attack Speed by [4-8%] for 4 seconds, up to [20-40%] .
uniques.flavor: When Caldeum's gates closed, Asheara led her Iron Wolves out of the city knowing full well they would never return. Instead they roamed Kehjistan pledging their blades to any who were in need.

uniques.name: Axial Conduit
terciary_stats: Chance for Chain Lightning Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniques.effect: Chain Lightning alternates between orbiting you and seeking up to 3 enemies. When it returns, it drains 6 Mana from you for each active Chain Lightning. After draining 66 total Mana, the bolt explodes for [X] Lightning Damage. Chain Lightning expires if you don't have enough Mana for it to drain.
uniques.flavor: "Do not confuse your manipulation of lightning as control. The azure flame is its own master and needs no hand to wield it. You are merely a conduit for its chaos." -Ascribed to the mage Woh

uniques.name: Azurewrath
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal [X] Cold Damage
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: Up to a 20% chance to Freeze enemies for 3 seconds and deal [X] Cold damage to them.
uniques.flavor: The ancient runeblade of the angel Izual, Azurewrath was miraculously spared the corruption that consumed its master.

uniques.name: Banished Lord's Talisman
uniques.effect: After you spend 275 of your Primary Resource, your next Core Skill is guaranteed to Overpower. Your Critical Strikes that Overpower deal [20-60%] increased damage.
uniques.flavor: "His name has been lost to history, but to have been exiled from a land as cursed as Hawezar, his deeds must have been truly depraved." - Scholar's Notes

uniques.name: Battle Trance
uniques.effect: Increase Frenzy's maximum stacks by 2 . While at maximum stacks, you deal [15-30%] increased damage and your other Skills gain [35-55%] increased Attack Speed.
uniques.flavor: "The change that overtook my brother in battle was terrifying. His eyes turned hard like diamonds, and the way he moved... it was like he was dancing to music only he could hear." - Captain Dervin

uniques.name: Beastfall Boots
uniques.effect: When you cast an Ultimate Skill, your next Core Skill consumes all of your energy and deals [0.25-0.75%] increased damage per Energy consumed. Using a Cooldown restores 25 Energy.
uniques.flavor: "Genai grew proud and fond of boasting of her hunting prowess. She claimed she was fast enough to catch even the spirit Leraye, who cursed her for such an insult." - Fable of Genai's Twenty Trials

uniques.name: Black River
terciary_stats: Ranks of the Fueled by Death
uniques.effect: Corpse Explosion consumes up to 4 additonal Corpses around the initial Corpse, gaining [120-160%] damage and [10.5-12.5%] Size per additional Corpse consumed.
uniques.flavor: "The scrolls describe a river of tar that separated the living from the land of the dead. Any unfortunate soul who tried to cross would be dragged down into oblivion." - Notes of Scholar Kamien

uniques.name: Blood Artisan's Cuirass
terciary_stats: Damage for 4 Seconds After Picking up a Blood Orb
uniques.effect: When you pick up [10-3] Blood Orbs, a free Bone Spirit is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.
uniques.flavor: "The infamous Necromancer Gaza-Thul's mastery over blood magic was indisputable. Many suspect that upon his death, his skin was used to fashion this eldritch armor." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: Blood Moon Breeches
secondary_stats: While Injured, Your Potion Also Grants 30% Movement Speed for 2 Seconds
uniques.effect: Your Minions' attacks have a [3-7%] to randomly inflict Decrepify or Iron Maiden. You deal [100-150%] increased Overpower damage to enemies affected by your Curses.
uniques.flavor: A naturally occurring curiosity, the blood moon persists as a sign of woe for the most superstitious Zakarum faithful. Children born under it are often considered cursed and cast out, lest it spread.

uniques.name: Bloodless Scream
uniques.effect:
Your Darkness Skills Chill enemies for up to 100% and deal [100-200%] increased damage to Frozen enemies.

Lucky Hit: Your Darkness Skills have up to a 100% chance to generate [15-25] additonal Essence against Frozen targets.
uniques.flavor: "My companion swung her odd weapon in a wide arc, and our pursuer stopped short. The look of horror on his face as his body fell to pieces will haunt me forever." - The Ebon Pages, Canto II, Verse XI

uniques.name: Blue Rose
terciary_stats: Chance for Ice Spikes to Explode Twice
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: Up to a 30% chance to form an exploding Ice Spike, dealing [X] Cold damage. Triple this chance if the enemy is Frozen.
uniques.flavor: "Her lover's spirit faded and in her sorrow she wept frozen tears. Where they fell, roses of the purest ice would blossom each winter." - Greenslade's Tales, Chapter 7: "The Myth of Irina Coldheart"

uniques.name: Condemnation
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a [X%] Chance to Make Enemies Vulnerable for 2 Seconds
uniques.effect: Your Core Skills deal [20-40%] increased damage when spending 3 Combo Points. Your Skills using this weapon have a 50% chance to generate 3 Combo Points.
uniques.flavor: "I've never seen such ruthless butchery. He deserves to be be shipped off to die in the swamps with the rest of the godless murderers." - Witness to the murder of Sergeant Walcot

uniques.name: Cowl of the Nameless
uniques.effect: You gain [20-40%] increased Lucky Hit Chance against Crowd Controlled enemies.
uniques.flavor: "He is banished from the Guild, his name stricken from the Book. His punishment is to never have been." - Excerpt from a burned parchment

uniques.name: Crown of Lucion
uniques.effect: Each time you use a Skill with a Resource Cost, gain x [5-15%] increased damage and Resource Cost is increased by +30% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.
uniques.flavor: The prince of Hatred, fair as maggots over carrion. He claims no throne, crafts no realms, reigning over only a blackened, bitter heart. Some legends name him banished, while others dread his return.

uniques.name: Cruor's Embrace
terciary_stats: Blood Surge Drains + [X] Times from Elites
uniques.effect: Casting Blood Surge consumes nearby Corpses to cause mini novas, dealing [X] damage. This damage is increased by x10% for each enemy drained by your initial cast, up to x50%, as well as by x20% for each Corpse consumed.
uniques.flavor: In the blood dancer's grasp, a victim lies, A vessel dried 'neath darkened skies. Their life extinguished, veins burst and drained, In Cruor's embrace, forever enchained.

uniques.name: Deathless Visage
terciary_stats: Chance for Bone Spear Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniques.effect: Bone Spear leaves behind echoes as it travels that explode dealing [X] damage, increased by x5% for every 30% of your Critical Strike Damage Bonus.
uniques.flavor: "Rathma is endless. He was the first Ancient, and will remain at the end. He is the master of the Great Cycle of Being. When Death comes for him, why should he fear it?" - Vauntus, Acolyte of Rathma

uniques.name: Deathspeaker's Pendant
terciary_stats: +1 Essence per Enemy Drained by Blood Surge
uniques.effect: Blood Surge casts a mini nova on your Minions, dealing [X] damage. Damage is increased by 10% per target drained by the initial cast, up to 50%.
uniques.flavor: Once a sanctum for Rathma's studies, the Temple of the Deathspeaker became a proving grounds for potential leaders of his priesthood. Its halls are filled with the corpses of those who failed.

uniques.name: Dolmen Stone
terciary_stats: Movement Speed while Hurricane is Active
uniques.effect: Casting Boulder while Hurricane is active will cause your boulders to rotate around you instead. Boulder's damage is increased by [10-30%] for each one currently rotating. You may have up to 10 Boulders active at a time.
uniques.flavor: "As the hateful mob beat on his door, he gripped the pulsing shard tightly and screamed for calm. When he opened his eyes, all that greeted him was silence and the blood-smeared ruins of his cottage."

uniques.name: Doombringer
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a 5% Chance to Heal for 2,687 Life
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: Up to a 25% chance to deal [X] Shadow damage to surrounding enemies and reduce their damage dealt by 20% for 5 seconds.
uniques.flavor: Whenever this ancient sword has reappeared throughout history, it portends a time of great strife, as well as a devastating loss of life.

uniques.name: Eaglehorn
terciary_stats: Chance for Penetrating Shot Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniques.effect:
Penetrating Shot makes enemies Vulnerable for 3 seconds.
Every 4th cast of Penetrating Shot bouces off walls and deals [50-150%] more damage.
uniques.flavor: "Scholars have been unable to decipher the runes carved into this bow, however all agree they are related to its uncanny ability to bend arrows towards their targets." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: Earthbreaker
terciary_stats: Chance for Landslide Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniques.effect: Casts of Landslide leave behind Tectonic Spikes that deal [X] Physical damage over 2 seconds. Spawning a Landslide pillar within Tectonic Spikes has a [20-30%] chance to spawn two instead.
uniques.flavor: When Arreat was sundered, the world quaked. The Druid Aglainn journeyed far to chronicle the aftermath. Grief-stricken by the great mountain king's fall, he rent the earth anew.

uniques.name: Ebonpiercer
terciary_stats: Chance for Blight Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniques.effect: Blight also shoots 4 smaller projectiles that pierce enemies and deal [X] Shadow damage over 3 seconds.
uniques.flavor: This talisman was the life's work of Deathspeaker Jurdann. Following his premature demise, Jurdann's successor wore the amulet in tribute as they trialed against the Temple of the Deathspeaker.

uniques.name: Endurant Faith
uniques.effect: When you would be damaged for at least 40% of your Maximum Life at once, it is instead distributed over the next 2 seconds and reduced by x [10-30%] .
uniques.flavor: Despite the Light's blessings, countless Knights Penitent were hewn apart by the infernal hordes. Remnants of their steel lie scattered through the Hells – dwindling lights in the chaos.

uniques.name: Esadora's Overflowing Cameo
terciary_stats: Movement Speed for 4 Seconds After Picking Up Crackling Energy
uniques.effect: Upon collecting Crackling Energy, there's a 15% chance to release a lightning nova, dealing [X] Lightning Damage, increased by 60% for every 100 Intelligence you have.
uniques.flavor: The only thing more potent than Esadora's magic was her endless hatred of humanity. As she lay dying, the pale amulet around her neck drank in both.

uniques.name: Esu's Heirloom
secondary_stats: Evade Grants 125% Movement Speed for 3 Seconds
terciary_stats: Movement Speed for 4 Seconds After Killing an Elite
uniques.effect: Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by [20-40%] of your Movement Speed bonus.
uniques.flavor: "While scholars have proven these boots were not created by Esu herself, it is noteworthy that they have been passed down since the formation of the Mage Clans." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: Eyes in the Dark
terciary_stats: Damage Reduction from Enemies Affected by Trap Skills
uniques.effect: Death Trap deals [50-150%] increased damage and will re-arm iteself once after activating.
uniques.flavor: "And so, when the sun dipped behind the hills each night, he knew that Ashen Jack would soon be near. Watching, and waiting." - Greenslade's Tales, Chapter 2: "Each Long Night"

uniques.name: Fields of Crimson
uniques.effect: While using this weapon, damaging at least one enemy with Rupture creates a blood pool that inflicts [X] Bleeding damage over 6 seconds. Enemies standing in the pool take 30% increased damage.
uniques.flavor: "We've been fighting these flesh-eaters for so long, been soaked in so much blood, that after a while it's difficult to tell what side you're truly on." - Daelyr, Crane Tribe warrior

uniques.name: Fists of Fate
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a [X%] Chance to Apply a Random Crowd Control Effect for 2 Seconds
uniques.effect: Your attacks randomly deal 1% to [200-300%] of their normal damage.
uniques.flavor: "Will you let fear cheat you, or will you risk everything to find understanding? After all, death is simply the coin with which we purchase life." - Zurke

uniques.name: Flamescar
secondary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal 6,000 Fire Damage
uniques.effect: While Channeling Incinerate, you periodically shoot embers that are attracted to enemies, each dealing [X] Fire damage.
uniques.flavor: The burn may heal, but the pain is eternal.

uniques.name: Flameweaver
terciary_stats: Chance for Fire Bolt Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniques.effect: Casting Fire Bolt through your Firewall causes it to split into 3 bolts, each dealing [30-100%] more damage.

uniques.name: Fleshrender
uniques.effect: Casting a Defensive Skill deals [X] damage to Nearby Poisoned enemies, increased by x15% for every 100 Willpower you have.
uniques.flavor: "This weapon is a reminder of the unbridled savagery of our druidic ancestors, the wisdom of which I see more clearly with every day that passes." - Moreg, Druidic Scholar

uniques.name: Flickerstep
secondary_stats: Attacks Reduce Evade's Cooldown by 2.5 Seconds
Evade Grants 30% Movement Speed for 1.5 Seconds
uniques.effect: Each enemy you Evade through reduces your active Ultimate Cooldown by [2.0-4.0] seconds, up to 10 seconds.
uniques.flavor: "Considered a failure by their creator, it wasn't until the assassination of an "untouchable" Caldeum noble that these boots' true power was understood." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: Fractured Winterglass
terciary_stats: Chance for Frozen Orb Projectiles to Cast Twice
Conjuration Cooldowns are Reduced by [X] Seconds when a Frozen Orb Explodes
uniques.effect:
Casting Frozen Orb has a [35-65%] chance to spawn a random Conjuration when it explodes.

Lucky Hit: Your Conjurations have up to a [50-90%] chance to launch a Frozen Orb at Nearby enemies.
uniques.flavor: Winterglass refracts light and also manipulates mana - forming complex arrays of spells and enchantments. These distinct characteristics posses great power, yet the outcomes remain unpredictable.

uniques.name: Frostburn
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal [X] Fire Damage
Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal [X] Cold Damage
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: Up to a [20-60%] chance to Freeze enemies for 3 seconds.
uniques.flavor: A touch so frigid it stops the heart and chills the very soul.

uniques.name: Gloves of the Illuminator
uniques.effect: Fireball now bounces as it travels, exploding each time it hits the ground, but it's explosion deals [30-0%] less damage.
uniques.flavor: After Inarius returned to Sanctuary, he sought a way back to the High Heavens. His first step was to reignite the religion he had abandoned millennia before: the Cathedral of Light.

uniques.name: Godslayer Crown
uniques.effect: When you Stun, Freeze, or Immobilize an Elite, you Pull In all Nearby enemies and deal [30-60%] increased damage to them for 3 seconds. Can only occur once every 12 seconds. Against Bosses, this effect triggers when dealing damage instead.
uniques.flavor: "The Sahptev faithful believe in a thousand and one gods. If it takes me as many lifetimes, I will find and kill them all." - Gaspar Stilbian, Veradani Outcast

uniques.name: Gohr's Devastating Grips
terciary_stats: Critical Strike Chance Against Close Enemies
uniques.effect: Whirlwind explodes every 2 seconds and after it ends, dealing [40-70%] of the base damage dealt to surrounding enemies as Fire damage.
uniques.flavor: "The brutish construction of these gloves belies the strength they bestow. Gohr was clearly no craftsman, but it would be foolish to ignore the triumph of his work." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: Grasp of Shadow
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: Damaging a Vulnerable enemy with a Marskman or Cutthroat Skill has up to a [24-44%] chance to summon a Shadow Clone that mimics that Skill.
uniques.flavor: Dark wisps creep hungrily across these gloves, like an assassin's blade seeking a life to steal on a moonless night.

uniques.name: Greatstaff of the Crone
uniques.effect: Claw is now a Storm Skill and also casts Storm Strike at [120-200%] normal damage.
uniques.flavor: "She has existed in Scosglen since before Fiacla-Géar walked the land. Her purpose is a mystery to us all. However, approach her with deference; she may grant you her counsel." - Airidah, to Donan

uniques.name: Greaves of the Empty Tomb
secondary_stats: Evade Leaves Behind Desecrated Ground for 2 Seconds
terciary_stats: Chance for Sever Projectiles to Cast Twice
Damage Reduction from Shadow Damage Over-Time Affected Enemies
uniques.effect: Sever leaves behind Desecrated Ground that deals [X] Shadow damage over 2 seconds.
uniques.flavor: "The massive door to my family's crypt, which had taken a dozen men to close, was thrown open. Had I known the horrors to come I never would have set foot inside!" -The Ebon Pages, Canto I, Verse VII

uniques.name: Harlequin Crest
uniques.effect: Gain 20% Damage Reduction. In addition, gain +4 Ranks to all Skills.
uniques.flavor: "This headdress was once worn by an assassin disguised as a court mage. Her treachery was unveiled, but not before she used its magic to curse the king's entire lineage." - The Fall of House Aston

uniques.name: Harmony
uniques.effect: Your Skills are all additionally Jaguar, Eagle, Gorilla or Centipede Skills based on your secondary Spirit Hall choice. Each Spirit type on a Skill increases its damage by 50%.

uniques.name: Hellhammer
uniques.effect: Upheaval ignites the ground Burning enemies for an additonal [X] damage over 4 seconds increased by x10% for every 100 Strength you have.
uniques.flavor: The demon prince Ikonoth slew hundreds of the Heavenly Host with this infernal hammer before falling to none other than the Archangel Imperius himself.

uniques.name: Howl from Below
terciary_stats: Corpse Explosion Fears and Slows for [X] Seconds
uniques.effect: Instead of detonating immediately, Corpse Explosion summons a Volatile Skeleton that charges at a random enemy and explodes. Corpse Explosion's damage is increased by [30-50%] .
uniques.flavor: "Can you not hear it? That endless scream from the cold earth beneath your feet!? They are down there, trapped, blind with rage! Waiting to drag us down into the sod!" - Ravings of Madman Gustav

uniques.name: Hunter's Zenith
uniques.effect:
Gain a bonus when you kill with Shapeshifting Skill:

Werewolf: Your next Non-Ultimate Werebear Skill costs no Resource and has no Cooldown.

Werebear: Your next Werewolf Skill will Heal you for [X] when damage is first dealt.
uniques.flavor: "By fang, claw, spear, or sword - send the bastards back to the flames from which they crawled! Soak the peat with their blood! For Fiacla-Géar! For Scosglen!" - Nafain, during the Days of Ash

uniques.name: Iceheart Brais
secondary_stats: Your Potion Also Restores X% Resource
uniques.effect: Enemies that die while Frozen, have a [21-40%] chance to unleash a Frost Nova.
uniques.flavor: The mad artisan saw his fingers turn black from frostbite as he worked the cloth, but refused to stay the needle and thread for even a moment.

uniques.name: Insatiable Fury
uniques.effect: Werebear form is now your true form, and you gain [2-5] Ranks to all Werebear Skills.
uniques.flavor: When the Days of Ash began, the great druid Nafain reminded his disciples that nothing, not even the loss of their humanity, was too great a sacrifice to protect Túr Dúlra from Astaroth's flames.

uniques.name: Lidless Wall
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: While you have an active Bone Storm, hitting an enemy outside of a Bone Storm has up to a [15-45%] chance to spawn an additional Bone Storm at their location. Each of your active Sacrifice bonuses increases the chance by 25% and the total number of additional Bone Storms you can have by 1.
uniques.flavor: Initially an unpopular choice to replace Mendeln as Deathspeaker, Daros quickly proved his worth with the creation of this masterpiece.

uniques.name: Locran's Talisman
uniques.effect: Your skills gain + [0.10-0.40%] Critical Strike Chance bonus per point of Primary Resource you have, up to + [10-40%] . Each point of Primary Resource above 100 grants x0.2% Critical Strike Damage instead.
uniques.flavor: A single petal of the Mother's own blood, slowly wilting under glass.

uniques.name: Mad Wolf's Glee
uniques.effect: Werewolf form is now your true form, and you gain [2-5] Ranks to all Werewolf Skills.
uniques.flavor: "He was not a victim of the curse - he sought it out. As his skin split and his bones cracked, his laughter never ceased." - Tale of the Mad Nobleman

uniques.name: Melted Heart of Selig
uniques.effect: Gain 60 maximum Resource. When taking damage, 75% is drained as 2 Resource for every 1% of Maximum Life you would have lost.
uniques.flavor: "Do not allow your passions to become obsessions. Fuel the fire that burns within you, but it is madness to allow yourself to become ash to please an uncaring universe." - Last words of Master Selig

uniques.name: Mjölnic Ryng
terciary_stats: Movement Speed while Cataclysm is Active
uniques.effect: While Cataclysm is active, you gain unlimited Spirit and deal x [40-100%] increased damage.

uniques.name: Mother's Embrace
uniques.effect: If a Core Skill hits 4 or more enemies, [30-60%] of the Resource is refunded.
uniques.flavor: "Every tome, every scroll, every book in this temple produces the same answer. The only being willing to stand against the Eternal Conflict, against the Prime Evils, was Lilith." - Elias

uniques.name: Moving Dodge (PH)
uniques.effect: While moving you gain [15-30%] Dodge Chance or after standing still for 3 seconds you become Unstoppable.

uniques.name: Mutilator Plate
terciary_stats: Damage Reduction from Enemies Affected by Blood Skills
uniques.effect: You are Blood Lanced, and when Blood Lance would deal damage to you it instead Fortifies you for [1-4%] of your Maximum Life and has a 10% chance to form a Blood Orb. Blood Lance deals [10-40%] increased damage.
uniques.flavor: "The Cathedral of Light's earliest attempts at crafting their penitent armor was to infuse the plate with painful blood magic, before such acts were deemed heretical." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: Overkill
uniques.effect: Death Blow creates a shockwave, dealing [25-45%] of its Base damage to enemies. Enemies who die to this effect also reset Death Blow's Cooldown.
uniques.flavor: The malformed snake creatures that live in the swamps are not content with simply killing their prey. They seem to take a malicious pleasure from inflicting as much suffering as possible before death.

uniques.name: Paingorger's Gauntlets
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a [X%] Chance to Stun for 2 Seconds
uniques.effect: Damaging enemies with a cast Non-Basic Skill marks them for 3 seconds. When a Basic Skill first hits a marked enemy, the Basic Skill's damage is echoed to all marked enemies, dealing [100-200%] increased damage.
uniques.flavor: Crafted from fragments of Duriel's carapace, wearing these gloves, or being struck by them, causes an agonizing sensation akin to pushing one's hands through a thousand shards of glass.

uniques.name: Path of Trag'Oul
uniques.effect: Bone Prison traps a larger area and fires [10-30] Bone Splinters at enemies trapped within. Increase your Maximum Essence by 2 for 10 seconds each time these Bone Splinters hit an enemy.

uniques.name: Penitent Greaves
secondary_stats: Evade Grants 125% Movement Speed for 2 Seconds
terciary_stats: Critical Strike Chance Against Chilled Enemies
uniques.effect: You leave behind a trail of frost that Chills enemies. You deal [12-25%] more damage to Chilled enemies.
uniques.flavor: Remorseful devotees of the Cathedral of Light must undertake a grueling pilgrimage, journeying across the frigid glacier known as the Serac Rapture. Only then may their gravest sins be forgiven.

uniques.name: Rage of Harrogath
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: Inflicting Bleeding on an enemy has up to a [20-60%] chance to reduce the Cooldowns of your Skills by 1 second.
uniques.flavor: Harrogath, the final bastion of resistance against Baal's assault on Mt. Arreat was destroyed along with the Worldstone. The survivors never forgave the betrayal that led to the loss of their home.

uniques.name: Raiment of the Infinite
uniques.effect: After using Teleport, Close enemies are Pulled to you and Stunned for [2-3] seconds, but Teleport's cooldown is increased by 20%.
uniques.flavor: The power you have is never enough.

uniques.name: Rakanoth's Wake
secondary_stats: Attacks Reduce Evade's Cooldown by 1.5 Seconds
uniques.effect: When you cast a Skill with a Cooldown, you explode, dealing [X] Fire damage.
uniques.flavor: Tread carefully on the plains of Hell, for each step sunders the soul and shatters the mind.

uniques.name: Ramaladni's Magnum Opus
uniques.effect: Skills using this weapon deal [0.2-0.5%] increased damage per point of Fury you have, but you lose 10 Fury every second.
uniques.flavor: "Without him the wine is less sweet, the hearth less warm, and our blades less keen. Our blood brother is gone, but Bul-Kathos willing, we will meet again one day." - Sorrowsong for Ramaladni

uniques.name: Razorplate
uniques.effect: Thorns has a 10% chance to deal [100-200%] increased damage.
uniques.flavor: Crafted by the cannibal Armoda, each piece of this interlocking armor has been sharpened into a knife's edge. Even a century after death, the plate remained on her corpse, unable to be removed safely.

uniques.name: Ring of Centipede Jaguar (PH)
uniques.effect: Your Maximum Vigor is increased by 100% and every kill grants [1-7] Vigor. Killing a Poisoned enemy grants a stack of Ferocity.

uniques.name: Ring of Eagle Jaguar (PH)
uniques.effect: Critical Strikes restore [10-30%] of the Vigor you have spent in the last 2 seconds, increased by your Critical Strike Damage Bonus. Gain Counterattack's Passive Effect.

uniques.name: Ring of Gorilla Centipede (PH)
uniques.effect: Generates [1-7] Vigor each time you deal Thorns damage. Gain Toxic Skin's Passive Effect.

uniques.name: Ring of Mendeln
terciary_stats: Ranks to Skeletal Warrior Mastery, Skeletal Mage Mastery, and Golem Mastery
uniques.effect: Every 6th attack from each Minion is empowered, exploding for [X] Physical damage.
uniques.flavor: The signet of Mendeln ul-Diomed, the founder of the Priests of Rathma and the first Necromancer, was lost for over 3,000 years. The immense power over death held within, however, has not diminished.

uniques.name: Ring of Red Furor
uniques.effect: After spending 100 Fury within 3 seconds, your next cast of Hammer of the Ancients, Upheaval, or Death Blow within 5 seconds is a guaranteed Critical Strike and deals [10-40%] bonus Critical Strike Damage.
uniques.flavor: "Anger brings strength but clouds the mind. You must learn to focus your fury, direct it with purpose. Keep our sacred duty at the forefront of your mind, always." -Talic, to Madawc

uniques.name: Ring of Starless Skies
uniques.effect: Spending your Primary Resource reduces the Resource cost of your Skills and increases your damage by x10% for 3 seconds, up to x50%.
uniques.flavor: "Yours is the power to pluck the stars from the heavens with the ease of a child gathering fruit from the bough." - Unknown

uniques.name: Ring of the Ravenous
uniques.effect: Rend's duration is increased by [4-8] seconds. Damaging enemies with Brawling Skills applies 2 stacks of Rend's Bleed. This can only affect each enemy once every 1 second.
uniques.flavor: "The hunger, it starts so small, like a tickle in the back of your mind. You believe the lie that you still have control until you're so far gone you can't even recognize yourself." - Varyana

uniques.name: Ring of the Sacrilegious Soul
uniques.effect:
You automatically activate the following equipped Skills on Corpses around you:
Raise Skeleton every [2-1] seconds.
Corpse Explosion every [2-1] seconds.
Corpse Tendrils every [12-6] seconds.
uniques.flavor: The mere proximity of a practitioner of such dark arts can rouse the dead and disturb those souls who have earned their rest.

uniques.name: Saboteur's Signet
terciary_stats: Energy when a Stun Grenade Explodes
uniques.effect: Casting a Core Skill has a [15-45%] chance to throw Stun Grenades that deal [X] Physical damage and Stun enemies for 1 second. Your Stun Grenades gain 5% Lucky Hit Chance.
uniques.flavor: "The element of surprise is the starting point. In this moment, be sure to finish it." - Kashya

uniques.name: Scoundrel's Kiss
terciary_stats: Critical Strike Chance to each Enhanced Rapid Fire Bonus
uniques.effect: Rapid Fire now lobs exploding arrows that deal [15-35%] increased damage.
uniques.flavor: "This'll blow your hair back." - Lyndon

uniques.name: Scoundrel's Leathers
terciary_stats: Movement Speed while the Inner Sight Gauge is Full
Damage Reduction from Enemies Affected by Trap Skills
uniques.effect: While you have unlimited Energy from Inner Sight, your Core Skills have a [60-80%] chance to spawn Caltrops, Poison Trap, or Death Trap.
uniques.flavor: "Rumor has it he lost them in a game of Skull & Anchor, but the boss is a devil with the dice. I think he wanted to give the poor sod something to keep him warm without wounding his pride." - Elstir

uniques.name: Sepazontec
uniques.effect: Your Basic Skills deal [100-200%] increased damage, always use their 3rd attack, and every 3rd cast unleashes triple strikes.
uniques.flavor: To the silent heavens, the hunter Etzlek raised his staff and smote the numen. "Release her!" came his cries as desecrated the hallowed ground. On the third strike, the spirit answered...

uniques.name: Shard of Verathiel
uniques.effect: Basic Skills deal x [50-200%] increased damage but additionally cost 25 Primary Resource.
uniques.flavor: This blade once bore divine purpose wielded by the angel Verathiel. Like its keeper, the sword fell to Infernal depths. Yet beneath this corruption, is a heartbeat of a past memory, holding steadfast.

uniques.name: Shroud of Khanduras
terciary_stats: Evade Grants [X]% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds
uniques.effect: Casting Dark Shroud makes you Immune for 2 seconds but your Evade Cooldown is increased by [9-3] seconds. Evading while Dark Shroud is active leaves behind an explosion that deals [X] Shadow Damage and Pulls In enemies.

uniques.name: Skyhunter
terciary_stats: Chance for Marksman Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniques.effect: The first direct damage you deal to an enemy is a guaranteed Critical Strike. When you consume Precision casting a Skill, that Skill gains x [20-60%] increased Critical Strike Damage and you gain [30-60] Energy.
uniques.flavor: "Genai took up her bow and aimed at the sun itself. The light burned her eyes, but her arrow flew true. Wounded, the sun hid, and brought forth the first night. - Fable of the Great Sky-Hunt

uniques.name: Soar Evade (PH)
terciary_stats: Attacks Reduce Evade's Cooldown by 1 Seconds
uniques.effect: Soar deals [10-50%] increased damage and your Evade is now Soar.

uniques.name: Soulbrand
uniques.effect: Your Healing Potion no longer Heals instantly, instead it grants a Barrier for 200% of the healing for 4 seconds. You gain [10-30%] Damage Reduction while you have a Barrier and may drink your Healing Potion while at full Life.
uniques.flavor: "To create such an artifact would require an impossible mastery over alchemy, transmutation and the subtle magics of the soul. By all rights, it should not exist, yet it does."

uniques.name: Staff of Endless Rage
terciary_stats: Chance for Fireball Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniques.effect: Every 3rd cast of Fireball launches 2 additional projectiles dealing [50-90%] increased damage.
uniques.flavor: "Leaving even blackened bones for your kin to mourn is too good an end for you." - Josiah

uniques.name: Staff of Lam Esen
terciary_stats: Chance for Charged Bolts Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniques.effect: Your cast of Charged Bolts have a [40-80%] chance to be attracted to enemies and last 300% longer.
uniques.flavor: "Also known as the Greatstaff of the Old Religion, this powerful relic is one of only a small handful of Skatsimi artifacts that have survived to this day." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: Starfall Coronet
uniques.effect: Meteor's Mana cost is replaced with a [10-4] second Cooldown and 2 total Charges. Casting Meteor drops 3 additional Meteors around the target. Its Enchantment and Enhancement drop 1 additional Meteor instead.
uniques.flavor: "The elders say they saw a star falling from the sky many years ago. A sign from the heavens that the end times were nigh. A rallying cry to take up arms and protect Sanctuary!" - Crusader Hamilton

uniques.name: Storm's Companion
secondary_stats: Your Potion Also Briefly Grants Movement Speed
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit Chance for the Pack Leader Spirit Boon
uniques.effect: Your Wolf Companions are infused with the power of the storm, dealing Lightning damage and gaining the Storm Howl ability.
uniques.flavor: "The storm's rage is my own, brother. I call, and the skies roar in reply." - Vasily, to Bul-Kathos

uniques.name: Tal Rasha's Iridescent Loop
uniques.effect: For each type of Elemental damage you deal, gain [10-20%] increased damage for 4 seconds, up to [40-80%] . Dealing Elemental damage refreshes all bonuses. Capped at four Elements.
uniques.flavor: "Fool said he dug it out of the sands near Lut Gholein with a few other 'worthless trinkets'. I hid my delight at receiving such a treasure in exchange for a meager handful of coins." Rakhaan

uniques.name: Tassets of the Dawning Sky
secondary_stats: While Injured, Your Potion Also Grants 30% Movement Speed for 2 Seconds
uniques.effect: When you take damage from a Non-Physical damage type, you gain [8-15%] Maximum Resistance to that damage type for 6 seconds. Can only apply to one damage type at a time.
uniques.flavor: “May the Light of Father Inarius shine down upon all weary travelers of this holy land. Turn your face toward his radiance and find your strength renewed.” - Statue Inscription

uniques.name: Temerity
secondary_stats: Your Potion Also Briefly Grants Movement Speed
terciary_stats: Lucky Hit: Up to a 5% Chance to Heal [X] Life
uniques.effect: Effects that Heal you beyond 100% Life grant you a Barrier up to [40-100%] of your Maximum Life that lasts for 8 seconds. You may now drink your Healing Potion while at full Life.
uniques.flavor: "The revelation that master tailor Callas was in fact a witch only served to further fuel the desire for her uniquely enchanted legwraps." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: Tempest Roar
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: Storm Skills have up to a [15-35%] chance to grant 4 Spirit. Your base Storm Skills are now also Werewolf Skills.
uniques.flavor: "Listen, child, to the music of the storm. It has its own rhythm. Its own melody. Hear how beautifully it sings, and perhaps one day you will be able to join in its harmony." - Airidah

uniques.name: The Basilisk
terciary_stats: Critical Strike Chance Against Stunned Enemies
uniques.effect: When you first hit an enemy with an Earth Skill, Petrify them for 3 seconds. Petrifying an enemy additionally deals [X] Physical damage.
uniques.flavor: "Well did she feed her children, and well did her children feed her." -Scosglen folktale

uniques.name: The Butcher's Cleaver
terciary_stats: Critical Strike Chance Against Feared Enemies
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: Critically Striking an enemy has up to a 100% chance to Fear and Slow them by [61-90%] for 4 seconds.
uniques.flavor: A nightmarish amalgam of blood, bone and steel, this axe is as horrific, and as deadly, as its creator.

uniques.name: The Grandfather
uniques.effect: Increases your Critical Strike Damage by 100%. The other properties of this weapon can roll higher than normal.
uniques.flavor: An unbroken lineage of unwavering strength.

uniques.name: The Mortacrux
uniques.effect: When consuming a Corpse, there is a [10-30%] chance to also create a decaying Skeletal Simulacrum that seeks enemies but cannot attack. When it dies, it explodes for [X] Shadow damage. This effect is treated as a Macabre Skill.
uniques.flavor: One of a pair of twin daggers, forbidden from ever meeting. Nearby corpses shudder in its presence.

uniques.name: The Oculus
secondary_stats: Attacks Reduce Evade's Cooldown by 1.5 Seconds
uniques.effect: Gain the effect of the Teleport Enchantment for free. When you Evade using Teleport Enchantment, you are taken to a random location.
uniques.flavor: "The rhythm of the orb, which had pulsed steadily for five centuries, quickened as its owner took his final ragged breaths. It were as if some intelligence within reveled in the sight." - Master Eos

uniques.name: The Third Blade
uniques.effect: Your Weapon Mastery Skills are now also Core Skills that have no Cooldowns but cost Fury, dealing [50-70%] of normal damage. Their Fury costs are reduced by 5 for any additional Charges the Skill would have had.
uniques.flavor: "Restraint, mercy, honor...these are shackles, forged by the weak and the conquered." -Hephasto, the Armorer

uniques.name: The Umbracrux
uniques.effect: Your Subterfuge Skills create an attackable Shade Totem for [3-8] seconds. Any damage it takes is replicated onto surrounding enemies at 20% effectiveness. You may only have 1 Shade Totem active at a time. This damage counts as a Trap Skill.
uniques.flavor: One of a pair of twin daggers, forbidden from ever meeting. Bitter voices whisper from the blade.

uniques.name: Tibault's Will
secondary_stats: While Injured, Your Potion Also Restores 20% Resource
uniques.effect: You deal [10-20%] increased damage while Unstoppable and for 5 seconds after. When you become Unstoppable, gain 50 of your Primary Resource.
uniques.flavor: "The younger apprentices think wearing heavy plate in the swamps is foolish. They fail to understand that our armor is our legacy, and without it we are nothing." - Crusader Pembroke

uniques.name: Tuskhelm of Joritz the Mighty
uniques.effect: When you gain Berserking while already Berserk, you have a [40-60%] chance to become more enraged granting x15% increased damage, 2 Fury per second, and 10% Cooldown Reduction.
uniques.flavor: As he fought with side by side with Raekor to liberate the labor camp, Joritz claimed this dented helm from a fallen foe. As his legend grew, its unique shape became synonymous with his great deeds.

uniques.name: Twin Strikes
uniques.effect: After casting Double Swing 4 times, your next Double Swing will hit 2 additional times, each dealing [10-40%] increased damage.
uniques.flavor: "When hitting it once doesn't kill it, hit it twice." - Bear Tribe Proverb

uniques.name: Tyrael's Might
uniques.effect: While at full Life, your Skills unleash a divine barrage dealing [X] damage.
uniques.flavor: "Thus Tyrael, a perfect aspect of Justice, came to be. None were more vehement against the forces of hell. All demonic entities learned to shudder at Justice's might." - The Books of Jarl, Volume I

uniques.name: Unbroken Chain
uniques.effect: Casting Steel Grasp reduces Iron Maelstrom’s Cooldown by [3.3-10] seconds. Enemies damaged by Iron Maelstrom deal [10-30%] less damage for 6 seconds.
uniques.flavor: After the warmaster Raekor freed her people, the Oxen tribe continued to wear their collars and chains to honor those who died in thralldom under the Samauren Empire.

uniques.name: Unsung Ascetic's Wraps
uniques.effect:
Lightning Storm gains 1 additional strike each times it grows.
Lightning Storm Critical Strikes cause lightning to strike twice, dealing [10-40%] increased damage.
uniques.flavor: "The storm caller returns, day after day, demanding to meet the Tree. He beats his chest and demonstrates his powers, refusing to believe that he will never be chosen." - Excerpt from Gulyas' Diary

uniques.name: Vasily's Prayer
uniques.effect: Your Earth Skills are now also Werebear Skills and Fortify you for [2-5%] of your Maximum Health.
uniques.flavor: "Roots from the Great Oak growing at the seaward statue of Vasily will, on rare occasions, be found twisted back upon themselves, suffused with ferocious magic." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: Vox Omnium
uniques.effect: Casting a Core Skill additionally fires 2 instances of Fire Bolt, Frost Bolt, or Spark, matching the elements of your last 2 non-Core Skill casts. These projectiles deal x [30-90%] increased damage.
uniques.flavor: Your incantations are echoed by a chorus of the damned. Wield their torment, their vengeance, their pain against the Hellborne that tortured them.

uniques.name: Waxing Gibbous
terciary_stats: Blood Howl Grants Stealth for [X] Seconds
uniques.effect: Killing an enemy with Shred grants Stealth for 2 seconds. Breaking Stealth with an attack grants guaranteed Critical Strikes for [1-4] seconds.
uniques.flavor: The nights preceding the full moon are sometimes far more dangerous than the event itself. The frenzy has begun to rise, yet the night is just dark enough to obscure a hunter from their prey's sight.

uniques.name: Wildheart Hunger
secondary_stats: Attacks Reduce Evade's Cooldown by 1.5 Seconds
uniques.effect: When you Shapeshift into a Werewolf or a Werebear, you gain Wildheart for 5 seconds. Wildheart grants you [1-3%] stacking damage every 2 seconds up to [20-60%] .
uniques.flavor: Do not seek comfort in the shapes of the moon, beastwalker. Its pallid light awakens a yawning hunger. Call the beast, but do not tarry. Lest you never return to your own skin.

uniques.name: Windforce
terciary_stats: Chance for Barrage Projectiles to Cast Twice
uniques.effect: Hits of Barrage have a [30-50%] chance to deal double damage and Knock Down enemies.
uniques.flavor: "There have been numerous world-shaping conflicts throughout history. This bow has been found on the battlefield of every one, and always in the hands of the victors." - Barrett's Book of Implements

uniques.name: Word of Hakan
terciary_stats: Chance for Rain of Arrows Waves to Cast Twice
uniques.effect: Your Rain of Arrows is always Imbued with all Imbuements at once and receives your Arrow Storm benefits.
uniques.flavor: "Let the great gates of Caldeum be sealed. Let its proud walls stand fiercely defended. The rest of Kehjistan may suffer this plague, but my city, and my people, will not." - Proclamation of Hakan II

uniques.name: Writhing Band of Trickery
uniques.effect: Casting a Subterfuge Skill leaves behind a Decoy Trap that continuously Taunts and lures enemies. After 2 seconds, it explodes, dealing [X] Shadow damage. This effect is treated as a Trap Skill and can only spawn one Decoy Trap every 6 seconds.
uniques.flavor: The ring shifts and spins on your finger as the forces within desperately attempt to escape.

uniques.name: X'Fal's Corroded Signet
uniques.effect: Lucky Hit: Your damage over time effects have up to a 75% chance to erupt, dealing [X] damage of the same type to surrounding enemies.
uniques.flavor: Skulking in the shadows of the Realm of Destruction, the Scarred Baron plots the downfall of the mortal who banished him here.

uniques.name: Yen's Blessing
uniques.effect: Casting a Skill has a [40-60%] chance to cast a Non-Mobility, Non-Ultimate Skill that is currently on Cooldown. Can only occur once every 8 seconds.
uniques.flavor: These greaves are imbued with the divine blessing of Yen, the Veradani goddess of restoration. They bestow the wearer a revitalizing strength that enhances their own.
